summary.research_focus: Collaborative intelligence and decentralised software systems
summary.collaboration: Technically sponsored by IEEE.org, IEEE Computer Society Italy Chapter, IEEE Systems, and Man and Cybernetics Society Italy Chapter

submission_info.submission_guidelines: Papers must be original content not published or submitted for publication elsewhere, written in English, and formatted according to the IEEE guidelines at: https://www.ieee.org/conferences/publishing/templates.html

submission_details.author_requirements: Authors must include their names and affiliations in their papers.

summary.event: 33rd IEEE International Conference on Enabling Technologies (WETICE 2025)
summary.description: WETICE 2025 is a leading international forum dedicated to advancing research, fostering collaboration, and sharing innovations in collaborative intelligence and decentralized software systems. The conference focuses on collaborative methodologies and the empowerment of various technologies such as AI, Blockchain, and IoT.

publication_details.proceedings_submission: Proceedings will be submitted for inclusion in IEEE Xplore, Scopus, DBLP, and Google Scholar.

summary.community_invitation: We invite researchers, practitioners, and industry experts to participate.
summary.event_format: In-person conference with keynotes, sessions, and excursions
summary.conference_scope: Focus on advancing research and fostering collaboration in software technologies and AI.
summary.call_for_contributions: Authors are invited to submit papers on hot topics in several areas of computer science, data science, and software technologies.
